text: 12:8 Aposel 15:32; 20:28; 2 Korin 9:7; 1 Pita 5:2Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim gavgavim igharaz darazir navibar anɨngamin fofozim ikɨva, a bar deravɨra ingangarir kam damu. Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim biziba isa gumazamizibagh anɨdir fofozim ikɨva, an avɨriba me danɨng. Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim ingangarimɨn faragha zuir fofozim ikɨva, a deravɨra an apengan itir gumazamizibar ganɨva ingangarir kam damu. Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim igharaz darazir apangkuvamin fofozim ikɨva, a men apangkuvsɨ bar akongegh mamaghɨra ikɨ.
